page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content: The village of High Ongar is situated just off the A414 between Chelmsford and Harlow.It has a population of 1100.High Ongar was mentioned in the first Doomsday Book. There has been little change since then:it is still mainly a farming community today,as it was back in the eleventh century.The main changes have been the building of new housing in, especially the Millfield estate in 1948,resulting in a pleasant blend of old and new housing.Industry has also come to High Ongar in a minor way,creating employment opportunities for the local people.Brace's in 1926 and LECA in 1964.There are also a small number of industries on a n estate to the south of the village.The use of the land has also changed from dairy to arable farming.
